thread.section_title: MAXBACK Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of MAXBACK | www.maxback.com
thread.title: Cynthia

author: Cynthia
title: Cynthia
text: Initially, I was apprehensive to send in my Apple watch (in perfect condition) to a company I knew little about. I upgraded my Apple watch and knew there was still lots of life in my 1st gen Apple watch. I was pleased with the free shipping and super quick turnaround for my check, received less than 1 week after my product was received. I will be likely send in more items for cash back!
